QuestData.Title: Mor'shan Defense
QuestData.Description: Lok'tar, $r!$b$bThe campaign is finally underway! Soon, all of Ashenvale will be in the grip of the Horde.$b$bAs we expected, our offensive is forcing the enemy to test our defenses at every position.$b$bHere at Mor'shan, their assault has been decimated! But as the vice tightens, they will have no choice but to continue to press us here.$b$bScout the region, $c. Search for night elf survivors and cut them down before they can regroup for another assault!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kadrak at Mor'shan Ramparts wants you to kill 5 Ashenvale Skirmishers and 5 Ashenvale Bowmen.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $c!$b$bYour efforts will help keep the enemy on their heels while our forces sweep across the land!
